title: Now Free to Public
post: Fantastic news. I signed up immediately, and couldn’t resist entering Turin Shroud as a search term. Things don’t change much. A review of Vignon’s newly published “Shroud of Christ” (1902) says: “The scientific mind does not recognize as scientific a discussion which, after describing a few amateur experiments, points out how the result might have been attained, and then asserts that the result actually was attained in that way.”
author: Hugh Farey
